1: -module(pm_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    4: 
    5: -export([all/0, groups/0, init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2]).
    6: -export([
    7:          get_four_empty_piles/1
    8:         ]).
    9: 
   10: -define(EMPTY_PILES,[{pile1, []}, {pile2, []}, {pile3, []}, {pile4, []}]).
   11: 
   12: all() ->
   13:     [
   14:      {group, pm_utils}
   15:     ].
   16: 
   17: groups() ->
   18:     [
   19:      {pm_utils,
   20:       [],
   21:       [
   22:        get_four_empty_piles
   23:       ]
   24:      }
   25:     ].
   26: 
   27: get_four_empty_piles(_Config) ->
   28:     ?EMPTY_PILES = patience_manager:show_piles().
   29: 
   30: init_per_group(pm_utils, Config) ->
   31:     start_app_return_config(Config);
   32: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
   33:     Config.
   34: 
   35: end_per_group(pm_utils, _Config) ->
   36:     stop_app();
   37: end_per_group(_, _Config) ->
   38:     ok.
   39: 
   40: start_app_return_config(Config) ->
   41:     {ok,_} = application:start(patience_game),
   42:     Config.
   43: 
   44: stop_app() ->
   45:     ok = application:stop(patience_game).
